originalText.text: Chris is an outstanding therapist. Straight shooter, customized, focused-on-you approach. Great educator.  He listens and is very thoughtful. He has helped me to strengthen my muscles and alleviate pain from sciatica. This practice is very professional and they are dedicated people.

text.text: Chris is an outstanding therapist. Straight shooter, customized, focused-on-you approach. Great educator.  He listens and is very thoughtful. He has helped me to strengthen my muscles and alleviate pain from sciatica. This practice is very professional and they are dedicated people.

originalText.text: I rarely write reviews but felt it was needed in this case. I've seen quite a few PT's over the years for a pinched nerve in my neck, never fully get better and have painful flare ups. Chris was recommended by my spine doc at Mount Sinai. He gave me a practical education on neck health, proper posture and helpful exercises. It was clear that he had long-term experience, teaching chops and attention to detail. Now, I'm back in the water surfing again and feel confident that my exercise program will keep the muscles around my neck and shoulders strong to prevent flare ups. Thanks to Chris and to Stephanie for getting me into Cornerstone PT! Couldn't have done it without you guys.

originalText.text: I was recommended to Cornerstone by a doctor at Mount Sinai around 6 years ago.  Since then I have seen 2-3 of their therapists and they have all been excellent.  Very professional, knowledgeable and most importantly have helped me recover from various injuries.

text.text: I was recommended to Cornerstone by a doctor at Mount Sinai around 6 years ago.  Since then I have seen 2-3 of their therapists and they have all been excellent.  Very professional, knowledgeable and most importantly have helped me recover from various injuries.

originalText.text: Christopher was terrific! I couldn't sit long and was having trouble walking. I had trained myself to sleep flat on my back because I couldn't sleep on my right or left side. The exercises Christopher showed me have made all the difference in the world!

text.text: Christopher was terrific! I couldn't sit long and was having trouble walking. I had trained myself to sleep flat on my back because I couldn't sleep on my right or left side. The exercises Christopher showed me have made all the difference in the world!

originalText.text: The best professionals and the greatest set up.  Spacious and comfortable space with the most talented PTs, who get to know what your problem is and are focused on fixing it.  Full attention on you, not looking at other patients or iPhones.  I am so lucky to have found them! The office manager is super friendly and helpful.
